title: 28: Galaxy S8 vs. 'iPhone 8', with Lisa Hope King
description: Lisa Hope King of Cheddar.tv joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to talk about Samsung’s new Galaxy S8 and what it does — and does not — mean for Apple and the next iPhone.
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Rene Ritchie, Lisa Hope King
itunes:subtitle: Lisa Hope King of Cheddar.tv joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to talk about Samsung’s new Galaxy S8 and what it does — and does not — mean for Apple and the next iPhone.
itunes:summary: Lisa Hope King of Cheddar.tv joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to talk about Samsung’s new Galaxy S8 and what it does — and does not — mean for Apple and the next iPhone.
